activities: As a practice Spigit does not receive personal information from the EU. Spigit does maintain a data center presence in the UK. Spigit provides an on-line innovation software platform to its customers.  Providing personal information is not a prerequisite to use the system.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Spigit provides an on-line innovation software platform to its customers.  Providing personal information is not a prerequisite to use the system
recoursemech: Spigit is committed to working with appropriate EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to provide commercially diligent and reasonable response to all Safe Harbor requests for information.
